title: The Leo Enforcer
description: WARNING: This eBook contains mature language and content intended for 18+ readers only!  Sandy is very self-conscious about her weight. She never likes to go anywhere, and although her friends always invite her out, she respectfully declines. That is until she meets Mike Kane, the well-known hockey star. After he sticks up for her against a group of guys, she can’t stop thinking about him and little does she know, he can’t stop thinking of her either.  Littles does Mike or Sandy know that they are being watched and hunted like animals themselves. Sandy and Mike have a date on the beach, but then Mike mysteriously disappears. Sandy is left wondering what happened to him and why he would abandon her like that without a single word.  Soon Sandy will learn all about Mike and their unknown enemies who have been watching, plotting and planning to take revenge on her and her new-found love. Can love conquer all or it is a case of too little, too late?  Download for FREE with Kindle Unlimited   A standalone short story with a collection of 36 bonus romance stories inside!
author: Dana Ervin
